channel.title: Home on Gag Tree Studio
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Gag Tree Studio

item.title: Epic Fails Logbook: Scored Journal of All the Funny and Dumb Things We Can't Unsay or Undo
item.description:
Tired of forgetting the absolute gems of hilarious nonsense your friends, coworkers, or family blurt out? Look no further! This logbook is here to immortalize those epic moments of verbal chaos.

This laugh-out-loud journal is your ultimate tool for documenting every face-melting quote, accidental joke, and brain-fart blunder. With its fun scoring system, you’ll rank the best (or worst!) episodes and create a leaderboard of unforgettable moments. It’s also a great tool for team building and bonding, since we can be sure that all humans will human eventually.

item.title: Intro
item.description: Today we published our first gag journal on Amazon. It’s a great sensation to accomplish the first milestone for our studio.

item.title: Search Results
item.description:
This file exists solely to respond to /search URL with the related search layout template.

No content shown here is rendered, all content is based in the template layouts/page/search.html

Setting a very low sitemap priority will tell search engines this is not important content.

This implementation uses Fusejs, jquery and mark.js

Initial setup

Search depends on additional output content type of JSON in config.toml

[outputs]
 home = ["HTML", "JSON"]

Searching additional fileds

To search additional fields defined in front matter, you must add it in 2 places.
